Structs/PollEvent.html#/s:5Epoll9PollEve.name: init(_:data:)
Structs/PollEvent.html#/s:5Epoll9PollEve.abstract: Creates a PollEvent with the specified event types and user data.

Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV14fileDes.name: fileDescriptor
Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV14fileDes.abstract: The file descriptor for this epoll instance.

Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAVA2B5Flags.name: init(flags:)
Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAVA2B5Flags.abstract: Creates an epoll instance with the specified flags.

Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV3addy2OS1.name: add(fd:event:)
Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV3addy2OS1.abstract: Adds the file descriptor to the list of FDs watched by this epoll instance.

Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV6updatey2.name: update(fd:event:)
Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV6updatey2.abstract: Updates the event types and user data associated with the file descriptor

Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV6removey2.name: remove(fd:)
Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV6removey2.abstract: Removes the file descriptor from the list of FDs watched by this epoll instance.

Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV4pollSiSa.name: poll(into:timeout:blockedSignals:)
Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV4pollSiSa.abstract: Polls for and returns available events into events, blocking as required.

Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV5closeyyK.name: close()
Structs/Epoll.html#/s:5EpollAAV5closeyyK.abstract: Releases the resources for this file descriptor.

Structs/Epoll/Flags.html.name: Flags
Structs/Epoll/Flags.html.abstract: Linux only. Flags available to configure the epoll instance.

Structs/Epoll.html.name: Epoll
Structs/Epoll.html.abstract: Linux only. Epoll implements the Linux epoll mechanism.

Structs/PollEvent.html.name: PollEvent
Structs/PollEvent.html.abstract: Linux only. PollEvent defines the event types the caller is interested
